oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 2011: Video - Fishing with John T.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 2011 flood; rivers; fishing; Mississippi River; riverfront; recreation;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A locally-produced fishing show, this video includes some unique footage of the rising waters around Memphis. Includes footage shot from a boat on the Mississippi River.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wilkerson, John
